actions.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 2 (Roll no. 228).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 2 (Roll no. 228).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Connolly (VA).

description: Amendment creates an Industrial Base Council within the DOD, supported by existing personnel and funds, to provide recommendations to the Secretary on budget and policy matters related to the industrial base and requires an annual report to Congress on the Council's activities.
purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 111-467 to create an Industrial Base Council within the DOD, supported by existing personnel and funds, to provide recommendations to the Secretary on budget and policy matters related to the industrial base. Would require an annual report to Congress on the Council's activities.
